page.title: 16WITHINGTON THE MILL INN.
page.content: { The Mill Inn }is a well known public house which was built about{1588 .}It stands on a sharp bend opposite the old Mill House.The Inn is made of Cotswold stone and has creepers growing up the walls.There is a large lounge bar with a{stone inglenook {fireplace;}on the walls are hung guns and old pictures. There are several stuffed animals in glass boxes such as foxes,rabbits and weasels. The Mill Inn is very popular during the summer,as people enjoy a meal in the riverside flower garden.}Various meals can be bought at the Inn they include :- Chicken in the Basket at 2.45,Scampi in the Basket at 2,65 Snacks,salads and sweets are also available. A second public house the Kings Head is popular with local people.There is a skittle alley at the Kings Head.
